text: Taylor Swift ’ s brand - new single, “ Look What You Made Me Do, ” seems obviously about her feuds with people like Kanye West, Kim Kardashian, Calvin Harris, and Katy Perry. But what if they were actually all about a fictional character instead? A corner of the Internet is convinced the lyrics actually tell the story of Arya Stark from Game of Thrones, and the idea makes a lot of sense, if you think about it. Both Mashable and Entertainment Weekly broke down just how similar the lyrics are to Arya ’ s character on the HBO show.
